info.title: FORCAM FORCE Bridge
info.description: FORCAM FORCE is a IIoT platform solution for data driven manufacturing. It supports manufacturing companies to significantly increase their productivity. Its semantic data layer creates a uniform production data model and connects the shop- and top floor. The platform's open web interface form the bridge to in-house and third-party applications, thus enabling the free composition and collaboration of solutions. Connect today with FORCE to empower your workforce for digital transformation.

Location.description: The webhook creation response is required to specify a 'Location' header, the value of which will be used to delete the webhook registration. You must define the path of the delete webhook request as an internal action.
